author: Atomic Shrimp
description:
Join me for a few peaceful moments on the banks of the beautiful River Dee in the town of Llangollen, Wales.
Slow TV isn't for everyone - nothing is scripted here - no narration or music - nothing much happens, except by natural chance, and that's OK - there are no unexpected loud noises in this video and no midroll ads. Mostly you will just hear footsteps, bird song, and occasional other natural sounds.  You may also occasionally hear the faraway background sounds of human activity, but don't think on that for now - just enjoy this peaceful moment in the cool shade of the woods...
title: Slow TV – Scenes From the River Dee at Llangollen
